channel.title: Françoise Boivin
channel.description: Recent news about Françoise Boivin, from openparliament.ca.

item.description: "@foxdickerson: We are @MediaStyle. Changing the #Media landscape. http://t.co/9zusTyH2S3 #Video #TheFox" good job!

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Dans 1 hre la rentrée solennelle des cours à la Faculté de droit avec comme conférencier invité l'Honorable Richard Wagner #CSC #UdO

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Rentrée des tribunaux à Gatineau...1 thème récurent...décrochage judiciaire et justice inaccessible? #manquedejuges #BduQ #justiceOutaouais

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: "@WilliamMorinRoy: @RadioCanadaInfo J'ai hâte de voir le programme... Il sera certainement neutre..." On a tous le droit de rêver! Lol!

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: "@Proud_Canadian1: @FBoivinNPD @InfosOutaouais Je l'ai toujours dit, si quelqu'un pète au Moyen-Orient l'essence augmente!" Exactement!

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: "@EBraeden: Love how oil cies always find reasons to raise prices!! It's so effing cynical! And we just all go along with it!!" Yep #Fail

item.title: Mentioned by Ottawa Citizen
item.description:
Gatineau MP denounces Ontario government's 'cavalier' attitude on Kettle Island ...
OTTAWA — The Ontario government's announcement that it would not support a bridge spanning the Ottawa River at Kettle Island demonstrates self-centred thinking, Gatineau MP Françoise Boivin said Tuesday. “Is the Ontario side just saying, 'We actually ...

item.title: Mentioned by Montreal Gazette
item.description:
Stephen Maher: MP Brent Rathgeber's stand should give the Tories pause
11, NDP MP Françoise Boivin moved a motion at the House of Commons justice committee asking that it study allegations raised by Edgar Schmidt, a senior Justice Department lawyer who filed a lawsuit against the government in December 2012. Schmidt ...
